alert.note: Alert for Langlade; Northern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 03 at 9:18PM CDT until April 05 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM TUESDAY TO 7 AM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of one tenth to two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Langlade and Northern Oconto County Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM Tuesday to 7 AM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the early morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
